title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. II, pt. 53 - Pilot Vessels And Stations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. II, pt. 53 - Pilot Vessels And Stations

State Regulations
§ 53.1 - Stationing of pilot vessels at the entrance to New York Harbor
§ 53.2 - Pilot station at western end of Long Island Sound
§ 53.3 - Pilot station on the Hudson River
§ 53.4 - Pilot station at eastern end of Block Island Sound
§ 53.5 - Log book to be kept
§ 53.6 - Pilot vessel signals

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. II, pt. 53

Statutory authority: Navigation Law, §95

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
